fullInteractionType.comment: Drug1 (rxcui = 11289, name = warfarin, tty = IN). Drug2 (rxcui = 243670, name = aspirin 81 MG Oral Tablet, tty = SCD). Drug1 is resolved to warfarin, Drug2 is resolved to aspirin and interaction asserted in DrugBank between Warfarin and Acetylsalicylic acid.

interactionPair.description: Acetylsalicylic acid may increase the anticoagulant activities of Warfarin.
